message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it, but $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you consider $175?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to make a counteroffer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $182. What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. How about $178? I'm really close to my budget limit, but I'm very interested in this product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $179?
